Address.college_name: Faculty of Commercial and Business Sciences
Address.university_name: Fakulteta za komercialne in poslovne vede (FKPV)

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 2004 as Visoka komercionalna šola Celje (Celje School of Commerce). Acquired present status and title 2008.
AdmissionRequirements: Undergraduate Studies: for enrolment in the 1st year, Matura, vocational matura or final exam (4-year secondary school programme); For enrolment in the 2nd year, degree from a vocational higher education programme or graduation from other vocational higher education programmes

Postgraduate Studies: for enrolment in 1st year, 1st cycle degrees - vocational higher education programmes (180 ECTS credits) related to economics, business, organisation and administrative sciences, or social and legal studies; if other fields an additional exam is required; for enrolment in the 2nd year, 1st cycle university programmes (4 years and 240 ECTS) related to economics, business, organisation and administrative sciences, or social and legal studies; if other field the redaction of a seminar paper for Research Methodology or Company Strategy and Development is required

Doctoral study programme: Master's degree (Bologna model), or a scientific Master's degree, or a specialisation degree, or a university study programme worth a minimum of 240 ECTS credits plus an interview, or a specialisation degree (Bologna model) plus an interview if not Business/economics-related field, or 4-year university study programme worth a minimum of 240 credits and successful completetion of an MBA at a certified institution plus at least 5 years of work, or a study programme under paragraph 4 Article 36 of the Higher Education Act, worth at least 300 ECTS credits

Univerza v Ljubljani (UL)

GeneralInformation.History: The opportunity to continue studying beyond the grammar school started in Ljubljana with the Jesuits in the first half of the 17th century. Acquired university status 1919
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (matura) and entrance examination for Music, Drama, Cinema, and Television, Fine Arts, Architecture, Art Education, Pre-school Education, Textile Design, Sports, Musicology, Landscape Architecture

Address.university_name: Univerza v Mariboru (UM)

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1961, incorporating previously existing institutes established 1959-1961. Reorganized 1975, last reform 1993. An independent self-governing institution financed by the Republic of Slovenia
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (matura), or recognized foreign equivalent (Mednarodna matura)

Divisions.College: Civil Engineering, Transportation Engineering and Architecture

Address.college_name: University of Novo Mesto, Faculty of Health Sciences

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 2007 as Visoka šola za zdravstvo Novo mesto (School of Health Sciences Novo Mesto). Became Faculty of Health Sciences Novo mesto (FZV(, 2013. Merged with 3 other faculties: Economics and Informatics (FUPI); Mechanical Engineering (FTS) and Business and Administrative Sciences (FPUV), to become University of Novo Mesto, 2017

Address.college_name: University of Novo Mesto, Faculty of Mechanical Engineering
Address.university_name: Univerza v Novem mestu, Fakulteta za strojništvo (FTS)

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 2006 as Visoka šola za tehnologije in sisteme (High School for Technologies and Systems). Renamed Fakulteta za visoke tehnologije in sisteme, (Faculty of Technologies and Systems) 2014. Now Faculty of Mechanical Engineering (FTS). Merged with 3 other faculties: Economics and Informatics (FUPI); Faculty of Health Sciences Novo mesto (FZV); and Business and Administrative Sciences (FPUV), to become University of Novo Mesto, 2017
